503.description: The Health Check is not successful

parameters.name: hasAcceptedBehindWallTerm
parameters.description: Applied when 'addDealId' is provided. Indicates to retrieve all investors, whether they have accepted behind-wall terms.

parameters.name: isAllocatedBid
parameters.description: Applied when 'addDealId' is provided. Retrieves investors where their bid has been allocated or not.

bids.description: This field will exist only if the "addDealId" filter has been applied.

url.description: Url to upload or download file

parameters.name: isAsxCompany
parameters.description: Filter with (true) or without (false) asx companies. Null/Undefined to ignore this filter

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The ID of the company to retrieve all its deals

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter for only the specified deal type

parameters.name: hasBidden
parameters.description: Filter for deals whether they have been bidden by the investor. It is applied with "investorId" filter

parameters.name: isInterestedBidder
parameters.description: Returns all deals that the investor is interested in. It is applied with "investorId" filter

behindWallDeal.description: It is not possible to delete or change a deal to "behind the wall"

filter.description: Search by company name, ASX company, or deal number

type.description: Filter for only the specified deal type

logCurrentEvent.description: Array of deal events that have to match with the latest log

hasBidden.description: Filter for deals whether they have been bidden by the investor. It is applied with "investorId" filter

isInterestedBidder.description: Returns all deals that the investor is interested in. It is applied with "investorId" filter
